  • Method Details

    • generateKthPopularNamesList

      public java.lang.String generateKthPopularNamesList()
      Returns a string of execution status. In general, the function generateKthPopularNamesList returns "Success" if the inputs are valid, returns the corresponding execution status if the input(s) is(are) invalid.

      The function will be called by the function doGenerateReport in class Controller.

      Returns:
      the execution status, of String type.

    • getValidKRange

      public int getValidKRange()
      Returns the valid rankOfNames range. For some years, the database might not have 1000 names registered, the function getValidKRange returns the corresponding largest valid value for rankOfNames

      The function will be called by the function generateKthPopularNamesList in class KthPopularNamesReport.

      Returns:
      the valid rankOfNames range, of int type.

    • checkIsValidInputs

      public java.lang.String checkIsValidInputs()
      Returns a string of error messages, if any. In general, the function getValidKRange returns an empty string "" if the inputs are valid, returns the corresponding alert text if the input(s) is(are) invalid.

      Three inputs are checked:

      • startingYear: whether it is within 1880 to 2019.
      • endingYear: whether it is within 1880 to 2019.
      • rankOfNames: whether it is within 1 to 1000.

      The function will be called by the function generateKthPopularNamesList in class KthPopularNamesReport.

      Returns:
      a string of error messages.

    • getTotalOccurrence

      public int getTotalOccurrence()
      Returns the total occurrence in the KthPopularNamesList.

      The function will be called by the function autoSetPercentage in class KthPopularNamesReport.

      Returns:
      the total occurrence in the KthPopularNamesList, of int type.
